content.html: `git log --full-history -- src/path/to/file.js` This finds the commit that deleted the file. So, I checked out that commit, and then backed up one more (`git checkout HEAD~1`). This loads the file right before it was deleted! ðŸŽ‰
content.value:
`git log --full-history -- src/path/to/file.js`

This finds the commit that deleted the file. So, I checked out that commit, and then backed up one more (`git checkout HEAD~1`). This loads the file right before it was deleted! ðŸŽ‰
